issue.title: gazebo head frame or ROS head frame?

content.raw: I'm concerned that the different inversions used by competitors are going to produce results that are valid but not *correct* as judged by the competition. Can either another reference frame be used that handles the inversion or a standard ROS inversion process be provided?
content.html: I'm concerned that the different inversions used by competitors are going to produce results that are valid but not correct as judged by the competition. Can either another reference frame be used that handles the inversion or a standard ROS inversion process be provided?
